scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run copy-env && npx prisma db push && tsnd --transpile-only --respawn --ignore-watch node_modules src/server.ts
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run copy-env && npx prisma db push && tsnd --transpile-only --respawn --ignore-watch node_modules src/server.ts
scripts.prisma-generate: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run copy-env && npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma-migrate-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run copy-env && npx prisma migrate dev
